name: Moo'n Maniacs
description:
Moo'n Maniacs is a multiplayer competitive game in which you have to mine veins of minerals to obtain fuel and escape from a deadly asteroids rain that will kill you in ten minutes. But you must be careful, because there are other people who want to escape from the asteroids and if one of them gets more minerals than the others, it will launch its spaceship and kill the other players! Be the player with more minerals at the end of the game and escape from a certain death!!

RULES

- Create a room for your session and get 2 to 6 people to play the game.

- Pick up your box with 'F' and carry it to the mineral veins.

- Mine the minerals pressing 'F' being close to them, your box will pick up the minerals automatically. You can have a maximum of 25 minerals into the box.

- Get the box back to your space module, the minerals transfered to the module will be in a safe deposit, you can see the minerals you have into the module if you press 'F' on it.

-You can steal the boxes of other players, but be careful, your box will be unattended in the moment you get other box. 

- If you go away too far from your box, it will be unattended as well.

- Also, you can shoot ('Left Click') to other players boxes, making it drop its minerals.

- The player who gets more minerals at the end of the game will win, the rest will do that, but in pieces.

THE TEAM

Moo'n Maniacs has been developed by The Moo-Tant Gang and it has been made during the 'GAME OFF 2020' gamejam event, with the theme 'MOONSHOOT'. We're exhausted so we will hibernate all December, we hope you enjoy the game. Thanks for reading all the text.

Gladly, the staff of Moo-Tant Gang
